prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek, icy appearance and playful demeanor.
I want a legendary creature that resembles a gentle aquatic mammal with calming blue tones.
Generate an adorable Pokemon that thrives in the ocean and has a friendly personality.
Make a Pokemon that embodies grace and elegance while swimming through the icy waters.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a pearly white body and can glide gracefully through the water.
Design a creature that combines both water and ice elements, with a soft, flowing shape.
Show me a Pokemon that loves to play in the sea and has distinctive fin-like features.
